div.p: Situation codes describing the reason that a procedure, which might otherwise be expected, was not performed, or a procedure that was started and was not completed. Consists of SNOMED CT codes, children of procedure contraindicated (183932001), procedure discontinued (416406003), procedure not done (416237000), procedure not indicated (428119001), procedure not offered (416064006), procedure not wanted (416432009), procedure refused (183944003), and procedure stopped (394908001).

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183932001 (Procedure contraindicated)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416406003 (Procedure discontinued)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416237000 (Procedure not done)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 428119001 (Procedure not indicated (situation))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416064006 (Procedure not offered)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 416432009 (Procedure not wanted)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 183944003 (Procedure refused)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 394908001 (Procedure stopped)

publisher.value: Health Level Seven, Inc. - CQI WG
